LightningComponentBundle.description: This component works with custom metadata attached to the flow form component, ideally you should place this component on a review page. It will then trigger an entire form validation and update the flow form component to display where there are errors

property.name: recordId
property.label: Master RecordId
property.description: Provide the master record id for processing validations against

property.name: formName
property.label: Form API Name
property.description: Please provide the developer name of the form you want to display

property.name: parentObjectAPIName
property.label: Parent Object API Name
property.description: Provide the Object Name for your Parent recordId

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: Please provide a title for the validation output component

property.name: nextButtonLabel
property.label: Next Button Label
property.description: This is the label for the button that will appear when no validation errors have been found

property.name: completeFieldsText
property.label: Complete Fields Text
property.description: Provide text to inform the person with validation errors what they must do
property.default: You must complete the following fields

property.name: invalidCardDescription
property.label: Invalid Submission Next Steps Description
property.description: Provide text to explain what the next steps are that need to be completed prior to progression forward
property.default: We have picked up that some of your answers are not valid. Before you can submit the form you will have to complete the required fields.

property.name: validCardDescription
property.label: Valid Submission Next Steps Description
property.description: Provide text to confirm there are no validation errors and what the next steps are
property.default: If you have done all these feel free to submit... good luck

property.name: affectTextLabel
property.label: Affect Fields/Question Text
property.description: Provide the text you want to display on screen to help explain what validations error actions

property.name: sectionsToNotDisplay
property.label: Sections to Not Display
property.description: A collection of Section APINames that you do not want to display or validate within this currently displaying of the form
